title: LF Team or Duo
body:
I'm an ADC one trick, I've recently just got NBN looking forward to grinding 24/7

My personality is very laid back. I can use Discord/Teamspeak. I have a Working Mic. Been playing since season 3 and have a great understand of the game.

Currently Gold 2 Solo/Duo / Gold 5 Flex 

if you think I am suitable for ur Flex Team Add me "Shiney" I look forward to helping with the team to progress. I can shotcall if need be.

or if you are a support main and need help in solo/duo let me know. Just so you know, i'm not like those other people who play for one week. then are never seen again.

I have an extremely large ADC champion pool

{{champion:429}}

replies.body: Are you interested in joining a casual/competitive team? We are currently looking for a person to fill an ADC role? If so add Nekminut
yooo shiney, remember me? im down.. where did u go ? haha  i heard u went back to os rs...
